meanings.definition: The measurement from base to top of an object or structure.
meanings.sent1: The heighths of the tree were impressive.
meanings.sent2: The ladder was not tall enough to reach the heighths of the roof.
meanings.sent3: The heighths of the cake were so high that it touched the ceiling.
meanings.sent4: Her aspirations reached heighths that seemed impossible to attain.
meanings.sent5: The heighths of the mountain were shrouded in mist, making them appear mysterious.

meanings.definition: The highest point or level reached by something.
meanings.sent1: The heighths of the roller coaster provided a thrilling experience.
meanings.sent2: The heighths of success seemed unreachable at times.
meanings.sent3: The heighths of the basketball hoop made it challenging to score.
meanings.sent4: His spirits soared to heighths he had never experienced before.
meanings.sent5: The heighths of the skyscraper offered a breathtaking view of the city below.

meanings.definition: The quality of being tall or high.
meanings.sent1: Her heighths made her stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent2: The heighths of the mountains were covered in snow.
meanings.sent3: The heighths of his tales often stretched the truth.
